UiTestAutomationPlaygroundPage.description: The UI Test Automation Playground is a website designed to provide a platform for sharpening UI test automation skills. The home page presents various scenarios that are common pitfalls in modern web applications.

The purpose of this website is to provide a platform for sharpening UI test automation skills.

UnknownPage.description: This page demonstrates the challenge of using dynamic IDs in UI automation and provides a button with a dynamic ID for testing purposes.

elements.description: Button with a dynamically generated ID.
